name: Graham Corporation
description: Graham Corporation is a global leader in the design and manufacture of vacuum and heat transfer equipment for the aerospace, defense, and industrial markets. Founded in 1936 and headquartered in Batavia, New York, Graham has built a solid reputation for delivering high-quality products that meet the diverse needs of its customers. The company's core offerings include vacuum pumps, heat exchangers, and condensers, which are critical components in various applications, ranging from energy production to chemical processing. Graham's innovative engineering capabilities allow it to provide customized solutions tailored to specific customer requirements, ensuring optimal performance and reliability. With a commitment to quality and excellence, Graham Corporation has established a strong presence in the global market, serving clients in North America, Europe, Asia, and beyond. The company is dedicated to advancing technologies that improve efficiency and reduce environmental impact, aligning with the growing demand for sustainable industrial practices. Graham Corporation's mission is to deliver superior products and services while fostering long-term partnerships with its customers.
